item.description:
What are dreams?  Why do we dream?



What can we learn from our dreams?

Why do the memory of our dreams fade so quickly when we wake up?  

Are there hidden meanings, latent images, symbolic subtexts in our dreams?   Or was Freud right when he said "Sometimes a cigar is just a cigar".


Oneirology is the scientific study of dreaming.  What are some of unanswered questions scientists have about dreams?  To what extent are dreams therapeutic?
  

Lucid dreaming in one sense is waking up and consciously living within your dream.    Have you tried lucid dreaming?  How can dreaming impact creativity?






What are some your best dreams or worst nightmares?  Have you had a life changing experience because of something you dreamed.

What are the best techniques to ensure you can recall your dreams?







"Perchance to dream..."
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the back of the cafe, and find us at the long table.
item.name: Dreams: The royal road to the unconscious...
